title.header_employee_add: employees will be added to this policy
title.header_employee_remove: employees will be removed to this policy

duration_allowed_description.hourly:
Employee can book time off by hours which will be calculated to days based on standard working hours.
Ex: Standard working hours = 8 hours/day, 3 hours off = 0.375 days
duration_allowed_description.halfday: Employee can book time off by 1st Half day or 2nd Half day, both are calculated as 0.5 days regardless of standard working hours.
duration_allowed_description.caution_halfday: 🔥 Once this option is selected and saved, it cannot be switched to another option when edit later.
duration_allowed_description.morningafternoon:
Employee can book time off by Morning or Afternoon which will be calculated based on standard working hours.
Ex: Standard working hours = 8 hours/day, Morning = 3 hours off = 0.375 days

text.view_list_employee: Click view_button to see the list
text.warning_effective_date: You're editing current eligibility. All changes made will be applied on the effective date.

keep_balance_description.keepbalance: Removed employees will still be able to keep their balance. All time off requests will remain unchanged.
keep_balance_description.removebalance: Removed employees will lose their balance. All time off requests will remain unchanged.

field_description.assign_date: The date which the policy is applicable to employees.
field_description.accrual_frequency: Yearly: entire entitlement accrued on the first of every year. Monthly: 1/12 of entitlement accrued on the first of every month.
field_description.prorate_accrual: Entitlement for each employee will be proportional to their actual working days.
field_description.maximum_carry_over: Maximum number of days employees can carry from one year to the next.

columns_description.meet_any: At least one condition in this section must be true for an employee to be added to the group. If there is only a single condition in this section, it must be true.
